channel.title: Facebook on bad to the code
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on bad to the code

item.title: Political ads on Facebook for the 2019 Belgian elections
item.description: I was looking for a way to have the same level of analysis of Facebook that is possible with the Twitter API, but gave up after a short while. The API seems to me quite closed in terms of what information is made available by Facebook. So I was quiet interested when I come across this blog post of Mr Schmidt not on an API for Facebook generally, but for Facebook ads.
